lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Hey, [[name]].

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Take it easy. You're safe now. How're ya feelin'?

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: S'all right. I gotcha. Y'gotta be more careful with yourself.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: This should make it easier for ya. Still, stay safe.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Better equipment leads t'better outcomes. But it's important t'stay sharp as your tools.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: All right, that should get the job done.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: I work at Tian's Corner, too. Provide some o' my harvest an' eggs.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Pan Qing likes t'cook us breakfast when I'm over stockin' Tian's Corner with her.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: I've climbed the peak with Piper before. Trainin' t'help rescue everyone who gets stuck, like you. (He pats [[name]].)

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Y'ran into Wander up there? How was he? I should check in on him...

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Wonder what Cynn's been up to... Hope they're stayin' safe. You stay safe out there too. (He gently pats [[name]].)

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: You've met Cash? She's sweet, ain't she? Give her this for me next time, will ya? (He gives [[name]] a pat.)

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Careful out there. Rain can make it slippery.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Rain's good for rechargin' the soil for next year's crops.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Nice weather.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: You'll wanna stay hydrated when the sun's makin' it hot like this.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Make sure t'be prepared in case it starts pourin'.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Dimmer than usual out there, so watch your footin'.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Wind'll blow the acorns right off the trees like this. Careful ya don't get nailed by one.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: With weather like this, twigles play fetch with the wind.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Y'should stay inside an' stay safe.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: ... (He's staring silently out at the weather before he notices [[name]] and gives the customary pat.)

meeting Quingee for the first time at th.key: meeting Quingee for the first time at the station

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: ...S'you. Hey. Glad t'see you've recovered 'nough t'be up an' about. (He looks [[name]] over carefully.) Take it slow, all right?

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Hey, there. (He gives [[name]] a greeting pat.)

after Quingee dies too many times.key: after Quingee dies too many times

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Listen, I'm worried 'bout you. You've been collapsin' on the mountain too much. Y'should rest.

after Quingee makes decent progress up t.key: after Quingee makes decent progress up the mountain

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Y'made it pretty far last time, but ya still need to take care, all right? (He pats [[name]].)

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Y'did it, huh. Glad ya didn't get hurt. Rest up now.

after receiving a gift you like.key: after receiving a gift you like

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: For me? ...Thanks. S'nice o' ya. (He pats [[name]] softly.)

after receiving a gift you don't like.key: after receiving a gift you don't like

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: ... (He still pats [[name]] anyway, briefly.)

after receiving a gift you're neutral ab.key: after receiving a gift you're neutral about

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: A gift? 'Preciate it. (He pats [[name]].)

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: This is Cap, by the way. (A spotted twigle wearing a Fire Station hat woofs softly in greeting.)

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: ... (The silence is comfortable, somehow. Being here gives a sense of security.)

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: ... (It's nice to have some peace and quiet.)

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: ... (Time for some inner comtemplation, perhaps.)

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: ... (Zane appears to be thinking about something.)

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: ... (Maybe now is the time to take a moment and just breathe. It's a safe space to do so.)

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: I train with Cap for search an' rescue 'cause he can sniff out those in need. (He pats Cap, whose tail wags.)

chatter 7, after Quingee becomes a regul.key: chatter 7, after Quingee becomes a regular, if quingee is wearing any accessory

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Ever met a draft mule? I could introduce ya to Temperance sometime. She can pull a fire pump all by herself. Strong old gal.

chatter 8, after Quingee becomes a regul.key: chatter 8, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Bet if Queengee saw ya goin' up the Peak, she'd wanna be carried up there. Likes bein' above others. She looks out for other quingees like you, too.

chatter 9, after Quingee becomes a regul.key: chatter 9, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: You ever tried rollin' t'get 'round? Polly, one o' my quingees, likes doin' it.

chatter 10, after Quingee becomes a regu.key: chatter 10, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Tea's the first quingee I ever met. Wonder if y'all would have fun hangin' out.

chatter 11, after Quingee becomes a regu.key: chatter 11, after Quingee becomes a regular, if quingee is wearing any accessory

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Your accessory makes me think o' Ivy. She's one o' my quingees, an' she likes wearin' a vine 'round her neck.

chatter 12, after Quingee becomes a regu.key: chatter 12, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Aside from Cap, I got a coupla other twigles: Watt an' Tim. They're still young, but me an' Cap look out for 'em.

chatter 13, after Quingee becomes a regu.key: chatter 13, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: I got a fluster, Gent, who steps so quiet you'd think his hooves were as small as your feet.

chatter 14, after Quingee becomes a regu.key: chatter 14, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: If ya ever wanna meet a real friendly fluster, Cud's 'round here sometimes. She rotates between the station an' my farm like the others.

chatter 15, after Quingee becomes a regu.key: chatter 15, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: If ya hear a fluster from the stables here, s'probably Rough. He's got a big personality.

chatter 16, after Quingee becomes a regu.key: chatter 16, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Seer's the first fluster I took up the peak with me. She's calm in a pinch an' follows directions well.

chatter 17, after Quingee becomes a regu.key: chatter 17, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Y'got any cyao friends? My cyao, Pea, gets along well with my quingees.

chatter 18, after Quingee becomes a regu.key: chatter 18, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Met any wroxen yet? I got a family o' them on the farm. All three o' them are artists.

chatter 19, after Quingee becomes a regu.key: chatter 19, after Quingee becomes a regular, on a sunny day

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: My kasoots, Mae an' Gala, like lyin' in the sun on days like this. D'you?

chatter 20, after Quingee becomes a regu.key: chatter 20, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Y'might see some o' my cheeps runnin' round the station: Chari, Hue, Pattie, Grattie, Nessie, Connie, Dill...

if Quingee has the Stick of Hay equipped.key: if Quingee has the Stick of Hay equipped

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: ...... (He stoops down to get a better look at the stick of hay in [[name]]'s beak.) ...Guess we match. (He pats [[name]] contentedly. He seems endeared.)
